description: Change of use for the first and second floor from artist studios (B1c) to residential use (C3) by conversion into one 2 bedroom (4 person) flat and one 3 bedroom (6 person) flat. Second floor conversion includes the installation of 3 x rooflights into the roof. Erection of an extension of the ground floor (with roof terrace) and creation of two separate commercial studio spaces (Use Class B1c). Associated works and alterations.
decision_conditions: REASON: In the absence of any evidence of a suitable marketing campaign, the proposed change of use would result in the loss of existing Class B1 office accommodation in the Central Activities Zone that is considered suitable for occupation by small and medium sized enterprises and would be contrary to policies E4 (Loss of business use), E13 (Protection of Premises for Small Firms and Opportunities for Business Start Ups) and H3 (New housing and changes of use to residential) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, policies CS7 and CS13 of the Islington Core Strategy 2011 and policies 2.10 (Central Activities Zone – strategic priorities), 2.11 (Central Activities Zone – strategic functions), 2.12 (Central Activities Zone – predominantly local activities), 2.13 (Opportunity areas and intensification areas), 4.1 (Developing London’s economy) and 4.2 (Offices) of the London Plan 2011.
